column5: You will get a first overview about the main functionalities of the OTRS ticket system
column6: Basic idea of a ticket systems: a message from the customer to the company
column7:
You start as the Customer
- compose a new message from the 'kun.de@priv.at' mailbox to 'support@firma.de'
- send the email
- visit the company's website on firma.de
- send the contact message (email with X-OTRS-Header)

You as the Agent
- login to the agent interface on localhost/otrs/index.pl
- find the tickets of your sent messages
